entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
